files.patch:
@@ -219,0 +219,1 @@
+          - jdk/crac
@@ -232,0 +233,3 @@
+          - test: jdk/crac
+            suites: test/jdk/jdk/crac
+            artifact: -debug
@@ -256,0 +260,3 @@
+      CRIU_FILENAME: "${{ fromJson(needs.prerequisites.outputs.dependencies).LINUX_X64_CRIU_FILENAME }}"
+      CRIU_URL: "${{ fromJson(needs.prerequisites.outputs.dependencies).LINUX_X64_CRIU_URL }}"
+      CRIU_SHA256: "${{ fromJson(needs.prerequisites.outputs.dependencies).LINUX_X64_CRIU_SHA256 }}"
@@ -277,0 +284,17 @@
+      - name: Restore CRIU from cache
+        id: criu
+        uses: actions/cache@v3
+        with:
+          path: ~/criu/criu
+          key: criu-${{ runner.os }}-${{ env.CRIU_SHA256 }}
+
+      - name: Download CRIU
+        run: |
+          mkdir -p "${HOME}/criu"
+          wget -O "${HOME}/criu/${CRIU_FILENAME}" "${CRIU_URL}"
+          echo "${CRIU_SHA256} ${HOME}/criu/${CRIU_FILENAME}" | sha256sum -c >/dev/null -
+          tar -xf "${HOME}/criu/${CRIU_FILENAME}" -C "${HOME}/criu"
+          criu=`find $HOME/criu -type f -name criu`
+          mv ${criu} ${HOME}/criu/criu
+        if: steps.criu.outputs.cache-hit != 'true'
+
@@ -322,0 +346,8 @@
+      - name: Install CRIU into libraries
+        run: |
+          criuengine=`find ${HOME}/jdk-linux-x64${{ matrix.artifact }}/jdk-${{ env.JDK_VERSION }}-internal+0_linux-x64_bin${{ matrix.artifact }} -name criuengine -type f`
+          criu=`dirname ${criuengine}`/criu
+          cp "${HOME}/criu/criu" ${criu}
+          sudo chown root:root ${criu}
+          sudo chmod u+s ${criu}
+
@@ -684,0 +716,1 @@
+          - jdk/crac
@@ -697,0 +730,2 @@
+          - test: jdk/crac
+            suites: test/jdk/jdk/crac
